steps.name: I am on home page
I click on Bank Manager login tab
I click on Add Customer tab
I enter First name3 "Hemal" to First Name field
I enter Last Name3 "Purohit" to Last Name Field
I enter Postcode3 "WD17 9AP " to Postcode Field
I click on Add customer button
I am able to see popup display with "Customer added successfully" message
I should be able to click OK button on popup
I click on Open Account tab
I select1 "Hemal Purohit" customer name which added before
I select currency "Pound"
I click on Process button
I am able to see popup display with "Account created successfully" message
I should be able to click OK button on popup
I click on home button
I click on Customer Login button
I select3 "Hemal Purohit" customer name which added before
I click on login button
I click on Deposit tab
I enter amount "100"
I click on Deposit button
I should able to verify message "Deposit Successful"

steps.name: I am on home page
I click on Bank Manager login tab
I click on Add Customer tab
I enter First name4 "Hemal" to First Name field
I enter Last Name4 "Purohit" to Last Name Field
I enter Postcode4 "WD17 9AP" to Postcode Field
I click on Add customer button
I am able to see popup display with "Customer added successfully" message
I should be able to click OK button on popup
I click on Open Account tab
I select4 "Hemal Purohit" customer name which added before
I select currency "Pound"
I click on Process button
I am able to see popup display with "Account created successfully" message
I should be able to click OK button on popup
I click on home button
I click on Customer Login button
I select4 "Hemal Purohit" customer name which added before
I click on login button
I click on Deposit tab
I enter amounts "100"
I click on Deposit button
I should able to verify message "Deposit Successful"
I click on Withdraw tab
I enter amount "50" in amount to be withdrawn field
I click Withdraw tab
I should able to verify withdrawn message "Transaction successful"

name: Bank Test
description: As a user I want to verify xyz bank account functionalities
